casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy RICHARDSON. No. 232A95-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, for State of NC. Kenneth J. Rose, Durham, for Richardson, Timothy. Thomas J. Moore, II, Smithfield, for Richardson, Timothy. Mr. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of January 2016 by Defendant for Leave to Reply to State's Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
